attributes.action: Designate 1 parking space on  road outside every property that has no drive
attributes.background:
.
This far over due simple change in the law would save a multitude of neighbour disputes , cases of criminal damage,violence and all kinds of hostilities between neighbours and bring peace and harmony back to neighbourhoods all across the country.The current law encourages annoying selfishness

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
